appName.description: The name of this extension, displayed in the web store and extension menu.

appDesc.message: One click to batch download the best resolution images from the current news article.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

downloadButtonMessage.description: The text on the button which user clicks to batch download all images

downloadButtonTextPre.description: The 1st part of text on the download button

downloadButtonTextPost.description: The 2nd part of text on the download button

noImageMessage.description: The text on the button when there is no image found to download

supportedSitesTitle.description: The title of a list of supported websites shown when the active tab is not supported

supportMessageML.message: Modelpress Image Downloader supports the following websites. You can submit a request on this Google Form to add other sites.
supportMessageML.description: Shows the Google form url where the user can file a support request.

downloadMobileLabel.description: The text for checkbox that controls whether to include images that is exclusively for mobile apps on mdpr.jp

downloadMobileStatusTextInProgress.description: The text for in progress fetching extra images

downloadMobileStatusTextSuccess.description: The text for successfully fetching extra images

downloadMobileStatusTextNotFound.description: The text for no extra images found (404)

downloadMobileStatusTextFailed.description: The text for failed fetching extra images with any failure other than 404

downloadMobileStatusHelpLink.description: The link that explains additional permission

configKeepRecentClicks.description: Text label in config setting: keep recent clicks

configDownloadPrependJobId.message: Prepend sequence number to file name
configDownloadPrependJobId.description: Text label in config setting: Add sequence number to file name

selectAllButton.description: Text label for button in image picker that selects all images

DeselectAllButton.description: Text label for button in image picker that deselects all images

selected.description: Text label in image picker that shows selected count

downloadHTML.description: Option to download HTML page on sakamichi group website

daysAgo.description: Option to select how many days ago on message.sakamichi group

downloadVideo.description: Option whether to download video on message.sakamichi group

downloadVoice.description: Option whether to download voice audio on message.sakamichi group

downloadText.description: Option whether to download text as HTML on message.sakamichi group
